mapper.insert: insert into `articles` (title, trips_seq, created_at, updated_at, open_yn, thumbnail_url) values (#{title}, #{tripSeq}, #{createdAt}, #{createdAt}, #{expose}, #{thumbnailUrl})

insert into `trips` (users_seq, trip_comment, trip_expenses, trip_rating) VALUES (#{userSeq}, #{tripComment}, #{tripExpneses}, #{rating})
select last_insert_id()

insert into `trip_days` (trip, date, day_comment) VALUES (#{tripSeq}, #{datetime}, #{dayComment})
select last_insert_id()
insert into trip_stamps (trip_seq, trip_days_seq, trip_places_seq, image_url, place_satisfaction_YN) values (#{tripSeq}, #{tripDaySeq}, #{tripPlace}, #{url}, #{satisfaction});
mapper.select: select `trip_places_seq` as `tripPlaceSeq`, `place_name` as `placeName`, `address` as `address`, `latitude` as `latitude`, `longitude` as `longitude`, `description` as `description`, `region_seq` as `regionSeq`, `image_url` as `imageUrl` from daero.trip_places where trip_places_seq >= 1 and trip_places_seq <= 10

SELECT ts.trip_seq, ts.trip_stamps_seq, a.created_at, tp.latitude, tp.longitude FROM articles a LEFT JOIN trip_stamps ts on a.trips_seq = ts.trip_seq LEFT JOIN trip_places tp on ts.trip_places_seq = tp.trip_places_seq WHERE a.open_yn = 'y' AND str_to_date(a.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AND a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq = #{userSeq})

SELECT ts.trip_seq, ts.trip_stamps_seq, a.created_at, tp.latitude, tp.longitude FROM articles a LEFT JOIN trip_stamps ts on a.trips_seq = ts.trip_seq LEFT JOIN trip_places tp on ts.trip_places_seq = tp.trip_places_seq WHERE str_to_date(a.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND str_to_date(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') <= str_to_date(a.created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AND a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq = #{userSeq})

SELECT album.title, album.articles_seq, album.thumbnail_url, album.open_yn, album.like_yn FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY a.created_at DESC) AS row, a.title, a.articles_seq, a.thumbnail_url, a.open_yn, exists(select * from likes l where l.users_seq = #{userSeq} and l.articles_seq = a.articles_seq) AS like_yn FROM articles a WHERE a.open_yn = 'y' AND a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq = #{userSeq})) AS album WHERE (#{page} - 1) * 10 < album.row AND album.row < 1 + (#{page} * 10)

SELECT album.title, album.articles_seq, album.thumbnail_url, album.open_yn, album.like_yn FROM (SELECT row_number() over (ORDER BY a.created_at DESC) AS row, a.title, a.articles_seq, a.thumbnail_url, a.open_yn, exists(select * from likes l where l.users_seq = #{userSeq} and l.articles_seq = a.articles_seq) AS like_yn FROM articles a WHERE a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE users_seq = #{userSeq})) AS album WHERE (#{page} - 1) * 10 < album.row AND album.row < 1 + (#{page} * 10)
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM articles a WHERE a.trips_seq IN (SELECT t.trips_seq FROM trips t WHERE t.users_seq = #{userSeq})
select `trip_places_seq` as `placeSeq`, `place_name` as `placeName`, `place_tag_seq` as `tagSeq`, `region_seq` as `regionSeq` from daero.tag_region_place where place_tag_seq = #{placeTagSeq}
select `trip_places_seq` as `placeSeq`, `place_name` as `placeName`, `place_tag_seq` as `tagSeq`, `region_seq` as `regionSeq` from `daero`.`tag_region_place` where `region_seq` = #{regionSeq}
select `users_seq` as `userSeq`, `score` as `tagSeq`, `tag_seq` as `score` from `daero`.`user_favor` where users_seq = #{userSeq};
